tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE tour_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    log_datetime timestamp,
    tour_id INT REFERENCES tours(tour_id),
    guide_id INT REFERENCES tour_guides(guide_id),
    log_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE tours (
    tour_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tour_name TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    guide_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (guide_id) REFERENCES tour_guides(id)
);

CREATE TABLE tour_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tour_id INT,
    location_id INT,
    visit_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (tour_id) REFERENCES tours(tour_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES tour_locations(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE guided_tours (
  tour_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  tour_name VARCHAR(255),
  tour_description TEXT,
  tour_location VARCHAR(100),
  tour_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE tour_stops (
  stop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  tour_id INT,
  stop_name VARCHAR(255),
  stop_description TEXT,
  stop_location VARCHAR(100),
  stop_order INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (tour_id) REFERENCES guided_tours(tour_id)
)

CREATE TABLE visitors (
  visitor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  visitor_name VARCHAR(255),
  visitor_age INT,
  visitor_email VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE tours_visited (
  visit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  visitor_id INT,
  tour_id INT,
  visit_date TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (visitor_id) REFERENCES visitors(visitor_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (tour_id) REFERENCES guided_tours(tour_id)
)

CREATE TABLE tour_feedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  visit_id INT,
  feedback_rating INT,
  feedback_comment TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (visit_id) REFERENCES tours_visited(visit_id)
)
